testcase.name: runScenario["Verify user is able to scroll up-down the entire page", "Verify Products page of Sauce Labs"](1)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Verify user is able to scroll up-down the entire page # src/test/resources/TaggedFeatures/HomeScreen.feature:10 Given User accesses saucedemo website # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.verifyWebsiteAccess() When User enters credentials and Logs In # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.enterCredentials() Then User lands on products page of the website # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.userOnProductsPage() And user scrolls and views bottom of the page # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.scrollProductsPageBottom() And user scrolls and views top of the page # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.scrollProductsPageTop()

testcase.name: runScenario["Verify user is redirected to Your Cart screen upon clicking shopping cart icon", "Verify Products page of Sauce Labs"](2)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Verify user is redirected to Your Cart screen upon clicking shopping cart icon # src/test/resources/TaggedFeatures/HomeScreen.feature:15 Given User accesses saucedemo website # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.verifyWebsiteAccess() When User enters credentials and Logs In # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.enterCredentials() Then User lands on products page of the website # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.userOnProductsPage() When user clicks on shopping cart icon # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.clickShoppingIcon() Then user is redirected to Your Cart screen # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.landsYourCartScreen()

testcase.name: runScenario["Verify user is able to view all Menu options upon clicking menu icon", "Verify Products page of Sauce Labs"](3)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Verify user is able to view all Menu options upon clicking menu icon # src/test/resources/TaggedFeatures/HomeScreen.feature:21 Given User accesses saucedemo website # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.verifyWebsiteAccess() When User enters credentials and Logs In # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.enterCredentials() Then User lands on products page of the website # StepDefination.ProductsPageVerify.userOnProductsPage() When User clicks on Menu icon # StepDefination.ViewMenuStepDefination.clickMenuicon() Then Menu options should get displayed # StepDefination.ViewMenuStepDefination.viewMenuOptions()

testcase.name: runScenario["Verify user redirects to Product detail screen upon clicking on any product from Products page", "Verify Products page of Sauce Labs"](4)

testcase.name: runScenario["Verify user is redirected to Your Cart screen upon clicking shopping cart icon", "Verify Your Cart page of sauce labs"](5)
